description:
Two looks, one toque. The classic knit goes great with all your winter activities, and is fully reversible to let you switch up your style.

  • Made of a merino wool and acrylic blend that's super soft and cozy warm
  • Double layered jersey balances warmth and breathability
  • Fully reversible with contrast colour blocking on the opposite side
  • One size fits most heads
name: MEC Reversible Merino Toque - Unisex
